Job Description: Job responsibilities:• As the ‘Sales & Marketing Manager’ you will manage both online and offline sales and marketing of the company, and create monthly marketing plans for execution• (I) Online Sales & Marketing – You will manage Mango Finance’s online channels to acquire new customers (e.g. Facebook, Website, YouTube, TikTok, etc.)• You will be in-charge of running digital advertisements, and create / plan content, videos, and key visuals that will attract customers • (II) Offline Sales & Marketing – You will also manage Mango Finance’s offline channels to acquire new customers (e.g. banner, leaflet, signboard, etc.)• You will decide which are the best methods and areas to do offline marketing to attract target customers, and will also ensure that all Mango Finance dealer-partners have proper shop sign and branding• (III) Sales & Marketing Planning – At the start of each month, you will come up with a monthly sales & marketing plan with budgets required for each campaign• (IV) Marketing Analysis & Reporting – You will measure the effectiveness of each marketing channel using data, and make data-driven recommendations on which communication channels to spend more on
Job Requirement: Job requirements:• Preferably of Cambodian nationality, must be able to speak and write English and Khmer fluently• Previous Sales and/or Marketing experience in Financial or Wallet Payments company is strongly preferred• Minimum 4-5 years in a Sales and/or Marketing role• Able to do simple data analysis, and can operate in a fast-paced environment• Excellent analytical, communication, and interpersonal skills and strong skill-set in MS Office applications, especially MS Excel
Company Profile:
Established in 2021, Mango Finance PLC is a digital microfinance startup based in Phnom Penh, Cambodia, capitalized by an investment from Vipar Auto FZCO, Dubai. With direct access to over 100,000 customers, we are capturing the opportunity to lend digitally and securely.

Mango Finance PLC intends to transform the microfinance landscape in Cambodia by leveraging the powers of technology and data. We believe in improving access to capital for the unbanked in Cambodia, with our proprietary credit scoring engine.

Mango Finance PLC is a licensed Microfinance Institution, regulated by the National Bank of Cambodia. Please visit www.mangofinance.net for more information.
Contact Info: Contact Information Ngornly Hangming HR Manager 069777629 recruitment.specialist@mangofinance.net Phnom Penh Street Samdach Cheasim,Phum Chres, Sangkat Kouk Khleang, Khan Sens Sok, Phnom Penh. 069777629

Job Description: Job responsibilities:•	As the ‘New Product & Training Manager’, you will work directly with the company’s Chief Commercial Officer (CCO) to plan, rollout, and experiment new loan products into the market•	You will proactively get feedback from customers on the ground on how to improve our loan products to be faster and more competitive than other lenders •	You will also work with the CCO to determine credit policies and guidelines that will allow Mango Finance to lend to as many customers as possible, with the lowest risk•	You will also be responsible for training Mango Finance’s Loan Officers and Field Officers to build up the team’s capacity and knowledge•	You will plan weekly and/or monthly training sessions with the team, conducting training for areas of improvement to achieve operational excellence•	Your will also be in-charge of measuring and reporting productivity and efficiency levels of the operations team, and identifying staff that require further re-training
Job Requirement: Job requirements:•	Preferably of Cambodian nationality, must be able to speak and write English and Khmer fluently•	Must have current experience in MFI or Leasing business, with strong knowledge in credit assessment methods•	Minimum 2 years’ experience in managing a team •	Able to operate with a fast-paced and start-up mentality; able to experiment various strategies, learn and adapt•	Based in Phnom Penh, and willing to travel to the provinces 2-3 times per month•	Comfortable to speak in front of, and conduct training sessions for, 20-30 staff members•	Excellent analytical, communication, and interpersonal skills and strong skillset in MS Office applications, especially MS Excel

job title: Dealer Sales Consultant Team Leader (US$ 500.00 - US$ 1000.00)
company_name: Sinh Hak Hout Trading Co., Ltd
position: Dealer Sales Consultant Team Leader (US$ 500.00 - US$ 1000.00)
Job Description:
o	Assist Business Development Manager to lead Sales Consultant, Franchisee to build business in the assigned area
o	Play important role as a representative of the company in the assigned area to work closely with customers.
o	Educate the franchisee team to understand the company vision, mission, core values to and to ensure the franchisee strictly follow the company standard operating procedures.
o	Provide training & coaching to team members
o	Pay regular visit to customers, dealers, wholesalers, resellers, project customers and franchisee according to the call plan in the assigned area.
o	Work closely with franchisee to build business in the assigned area.
o	Ensure franchise stores execute and implement as company guideline and Standard Operating Procedure.
o	Implement promotions and marketing campaigns in the assigned area
o	Open more wholesalers, resellers, franchisee, project customer in the assigned area, and also to support the growth of the company business.
o	Other assigned tasks by management 
o	Provide on time sales report, daily visit report, market feedback report, competitors report
o	Conducting sales training to individual sales team of franchise
o	Execute monthly sales promotion and marketing campaigns
o	Implement a repeatable sales process
o	Coach Franchise retail store supervisor and their sales team members
Job Requirement:
o	Bachelor's degree in business, marketing or related field.
o	At least 3 years' experience in sales and marketing in construction business
o	Prior business development experience with supervisory level.
o	Proficient in Word, Excel, Outlook, and PowerPoint
o	Able to drive vehicle
o	Basis people management
o	Communication, Flexibility, Problem-solving, Critical thinking
o	Proficient in Khmer and English
Company Profile:
Sinh Hak Hout is one of the leading home improvement centers in Cambodia. Starting from just a 50-square-meter retail space in 1999, we have expanded our current operations into a 6400-square-meter show space. Our mission is to provide an excellent customer experience through understanding our customers’ needs and delivering high quality home improvement products across every channel and market that we serve. Our key success is based on believing that When our team members are happy, they deliver great service. When guests experience great service, they are happy. Happy guests make our business a success.

job title: Sales System Operation and Science Specialist
position: Sales System Operation and Science Specialist
Job Description:
Operation:
- Master Data, Promotion and Pricing, KPIs setup in system
- Level-1 support to commercial (sales) systems, provide functional support to users
- Preparing commercial (sales) system user functional manual
- Perform timely facts delivery with aligned accuracy level on sales master data governance, all reports and dashboards. (i.e. Distributors master, customer master, contract master, sales structure, promotion…) 
- Perform compliance standard operation procedure service level agreement timely/properly follow charter of approval.
- Communicate and drive changes, if necessary, to improve data collection productivity.
- Perform quality management and administrate functional set up on master data, outlets, distributors, sales journey route plan, sales call card, promotion, and reporting on a day-to-day basis.
- Perform other tasks related to the position and assigned by manager

Analytical:
- Support sales initiative business cases study and process of execution.
- Perform data sanity checks from trade and challenging the answer the trade in the purpose to ensure quality of data and correct execution.
- Liaise business requirement, change request, system issue between user and technical IT to troubleshoot problem or efficiency improvement.

Communication:
- Present actionable information and insights to team members and management.
- Answer questions about delivered results/ reports through with strong facts and discipline.

Innovation:
- Continuously develop and present innovative ideas based on data driven approach in order to improve current business practices
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Accounting, Finance, Economics, or similar.
- Advance in Microsoft Excel.
- Experience in Microsoft Office applications (Power BI, office 365, Powerpoint, Internet and email)
- ERP functional support (Account receivable, Production, Sales marketing…)
- Good Command of English both written and spoken.
- As part of your job scope, you may be required to travel to provinces or cities that may happen from time to time
- Creative and innovative problem-solving skills
- Team oriented, collaborative, diplomatic, and flexible style, with the ability to tailor data driven results to various audience levels
- Intellectual curiosity and a passion for data and analytics
- Strong desire to take initiative; ability to deal with ambiguity and competing objectives

Job Description:
Purpose of the position:
The Technicians most important task is to ensure that the installations are made professionally and to our customer’s satisfaction, that the equipment are serviced at regular, pre-determined intervals by a professional and dedicated team of technicians. The overall goal of the Technical team, under the leadership of the National Technical Service Manager is to ensure that every single Carlsberg Cambodia Drink served is fresh and meets the consumers’ expectations.

Core Responsibilities:
- Train customers in outlet training module for customers (pouring perfect training, troubleshooting etc.) 
- Performing and using the procedures on installation, sanitation, and trouble shooting. 
- Report to NTSM when ST has to go to outlets and travel for the service of outlet complain and after his return from visit. 
- Need to follow the detail instructions by NTSM/TSM/TSs
  1) Drink system installation and best Practices 
  2) Fault Finding trouble shooting 
  3) Sanitation service by routine. 
  4) Service and maintenance in outlet/store 
   - At sanitation time and in store, cleaning of equipment in a hygienic way 
   - Cleaning all the elements of the counters, drip tray, side panels of cooler and pythons 
   in a mild soap solution, then drying everything with a clean cloth. This also includes 
   ensuring that the cooler has full ventilation capacity and the condenser is not full of 
   dust. Likewise for post mix equipment. 
    - Cleaning and polishing of equipment upon return from outlet or event.
- To achieve a quality and efficiency KPI model for the Technicians by Manager.
Key Tasks Operations 
- Report for progress 
- Feedback information of the market to the immediate supervisor.
Job Requirement:
- Engineering degree 
- Fair in English Language 
- 1 yrs relevant technical experience, ideally in FMCG/beer environment, 
Effective, positive and energetic attitude 
- Ability to communicate clearly 
- Team-orientation and ability to implement the team work 
- Action-oriented, persistent and result oriented 
- Solid organizing skills
- Driving License (A)
